divs: Sighting Detailsi was ten maybe im now 17. it looked like one of them starships from starwars(i know sounds dumb) i heard somthing from my room and looked outside to investaget what was happening and the ship was just going straight and made a low humming noise. then as i looked back ferther down the ship it had a glowing rear it didnt prouduce any heat but it did make i low humming noise like a car in idile it looked like it wwas going about 50 to 60 mph maybe slower as if it was looking for somthing or someone.i watch it till i couldnt see any more then it came back. the front of the ship was to me and i notice that there was no lights or any sorce of windows to see through. then it left i never seen it again but i keep seeing smaller ships here and there near the same loction maybe 10 to 20 miles out. thanks for beliving me.
Summary: it looked like a mother ship do to size and how it was shaped it went straight whole time low noise.
trends: There have been no other sightings in londondarry
This sighting has never been favorited.
